biotools.summary: It is a command-line tool to retrieve and semantically annotate results obtained from QTL mapping experiments. It takes full-text articles from the Europe PMC repository as input and outputs the extracted QTLs into a relational database (SQLite) and text file (CSV).

bioschemas.name: QTL TableMiner++(QTM)
bioschemas.summary: It is a command-line tool to retrieve and semantically annotate results obtained from QTL mapping experiments. It takes full-text articles from the Europe PMC repository as input and outputs the extracted QTLs into a relational database (SQLite) and text file (CSV).
